name: The Rolling Chaos
description:
The Rolling Chaos

This is a  VR experience designed for Bad VR Design Project. It contains glitch effects, following path movements and fast tempo music. It might cause eye-strains, vertigo or trypophobia. From the second half of the path, the environment would become more messy. 

Please open The Rolling Chaos.exe file in the ZIP folder and put on your VR headset to have a roller coaster experience. To exit the game, please press “ESC” on the keyboard.
